channel.title: Flight of the RC plane
channel.description: A podcast for fans of remote-control planes, with information about planes, competitions, tutorials and tips
channel.itunes:subtitle: Competitions, tutorials and tips for remote-control planes

item.title: Flying an RC plane indoors
item.description: In this episode, Derick talks about how to fly an RC plane in a big hall, around people working and throwing stuff at the plane
item.author: derick@rcplanes.example.com (Derick)

item.title: The mutant RC flying insect from Hell
item.description: Gunny just got back from a 2-months vacation in Tokyo with the ultimate RC toy ever (TM) - a mean and noisy RC flying insect based on top-secret Japanese technology
item.author: gunny@rcplanes.example.com (Gunny)

item.title: The catcher in the potato field
item.description: Five RC planes fight to the death for the total control of the potato field - who will win?
item.author: derick@rcplanes.example.com (Derick)
